translations: 一条，一块（面包）；（美味食物切碎压成块后烹制成的）糕

sentences.sentence: He was sawing energetically at a loaf of bread.
sentences.translation: 他正用力切着一条面包。

sentences.sentence: The cost of a loaf of bread has increased five-fold.
sentences.translation: 一块面包的价格已经涨了5倍。

sentences.sentence: Be quick, Gretchen! I had the silver pieces put into the smallest loaf to give you.
sentences.translation: 快点，格雷琴！我让人把这些银币放在最小的面包里并且给你。
